attributes.action: Impose tougher sentences on perpertrators of domestic violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned and myself think the way domestic violence is currently dealt with by the law is dispicable, more people would come forward if they knew it would be dealt with more seriously and perpertrators knew there were severe consequences, abuse of any any kind is never right, and i would be very happy to discuss in more detail with the relevant person, ways in which i think we can put a stop to domestic violence
